meanings.definition: The part of a shoe that covers the toes.
meanings.sent1: The toepieces of the shoe were made of sturdy leather.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the toepieces of her new sneakers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the toepieces of all the shoes in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her bright red toepieces danced across the stage, catching the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The toepieces, with their intricate designs, added elegance to the simple shoes.

meanings.definition: A piece of material used to reinforce or protect the toe of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The shoemaker added extra toepieces to the worn-out boots.
meanings.sent2: She sewed the toepieces onto the ballet shoes for added durability.
meanings.sent3: The toepieces, though small, played a crucial role in extending the shoe's lifespan.
meanings.sent4: His toepieces, like shields, protected his feet during the long hike.
meanings.sent5: The toepieces, carefully crafted, shielded the toes from any harm.
